com.facebook.lifecycle

Class ShutdownManagerImpl<T extends Enum>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.lifecycle.ShutdownManagerImpl<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShutdownManager<T>

    public class ShutdownManagerImpl<T extends Enum>
extends Object
implements ShutdownManager<T>
    Runtime.addShutdownHook() has no guarantee of order. This class will run hooks by stage and in the order added within stages
